Key Match Events: Dejounte Murray sustained a left hand fracture with 2:21 left in the fourth quarter during the Pelicans' game against the Chicago Bulls. He was fouled by Zach LaVine and avoided using his left hand after the injury
Others: Dejounte Murray was acquired via a significant trade involving multiple players and future first-round picks, and his performance in his debut included a double-double with 14 points, 8 rebounds, 10 assists, and a steal
